summary: Provides the infrastructure to transform C functions into NumPy universal functions within Cython, handling type constant resolution, typedef mapping, and generation of the required Cython utility code, as well as supporting initialization and AST traversal to locate function definitions.
business_intent: Allows Cython extensions to expose high‑performance C routines as NumPy ufuncs, enabling seamless element‑wise operations and integration with the NumPy ecosystem.
